Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-11614 affecting package dpdk for versions less than 23.11.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-11614 affecting package dpdk for versions less than 23.11.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package dpdk is earlier than 23.11.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-11614
